Html:
Hi Kendal,
I may have missed it, but I haven't found Service Pack information for SQL.
Will It be possible to include it in next version ?
Thanks for this greats scripts.
Kukah

Hi Kukah,
The SP level is in two places in the Database Engine Config workbook:
  • 2nd tab (Server Overview), column H (Level)
  • 3rd tab (Server Config - General), column D (Level).
Thanks for checking out SQL Power Doc!

Kendal

Thank you Kendal !
I had missed them indeed.

Edit:

Hello again Kendal !

And what about DTS/SSIS packages ?
This time, I've looked carefully but I can't find them.

Kukah
